T02TD2435E:48b-1: tsitta ma tra drishti n'a ma /
T02TD2435E:48b-3: sems tsam gyi lta ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2435E:48b-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2435E:48b-5: nam mkha' zhes bya'i gru la ni //
T02TD2435E:48b-6: lus ngag yid gsum dkrugs shing byas //
T02TD2435E:48b-7: bla ma'i man ngag gzhung shing btsugs //
T02TD2435E:48b-8: sems kyi brtan pa grum nan zhing //
T02TD2435E:48b-9: pha rol sgrol bar byas pa las //
T02TD2435E:48b-11: yod pa dag ni ma yin no //
T02TD2435E:48b-12: 'di las rnam rtog yod min la //
T02TD2435E:48b-13: dkrugs shing dag kyang yod ma yin //
T02TD2435E:48b-14: rlung gnyis kyis ni ded nas 'gro //
T02TD2435E:48b-15: thabs kyis de ru brtol te gnas //
T02TD2435E:48b-16: gru 'di myur bar ma bskyod na //
T02TD2435E:48b-17: bar nas chom po'i 'jigs pa che //
T02TD2435E:48b-18: rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs g-yos pa yis //
T02TD2435E:48b-19: srid gsum g-yang sar rnal 'byor lhung //
T02TD2435E:48b-20: sems kyi gru 'di brtan bzung ba //
T02TD2435E:48b-21: pha rol dag tu sgrol bar bya //
T02TD2435E:48b-23: yod pa dag ni ma yin no //
T02TD2435E:48b-24: ma rtogs pa ni thams cad kyis //
T02TD2435E:49a-2: brtags shing lta drug thams cad kyang //
T02TD2435E:49a-4: sems kyi gru 'di brtan bzung la //
T02TD2435E:49a-5: pha rol dag tu sgrol bar bya //
T02TD2435E:49a-7: yod pa dag ni ma yin no //
T02TD2435E:49a-8: mtha' gcig nas ni drangs byas nas //
T02TD2435E:49a-9: gru 'di gyen la bgrod par bya //
T02TD2435E:49a-10: sar ha ni smra bar byed //
T02TD2435E:49a-11: sems ni stong nyid gnas su thim //
T02TD2435E:49a-12: sems kyi gru 'di brtan bzung la //
T02TD2435E:49a-13: pha rol dag tu bgrod par bya //
T02TD2435E:49a-15: yod pa dag ni ma yin no //
T02TD2435E:49a-16: sems tsam gyi lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon sa ra ha nas brgyud pa slob dpon mee tri pas gsungs pa rdzogs so//
